translations: 不拘礼节地；亲密地；精通地

sentences.translation: 他亲昵地碰了碰她的面颊。

sentences.sentence: That familiarly solid and competent voice said, "Come in."
sentences.translation: 那个熟悉的坚定而干练的声音说：“请进。”

sentences.sentence: With these rooms I might now have been familiarly acquainted!
sentences.translation: 这些房间也许早就让我走熟了！
